description:
MozillaBuild is a meta-installer that provides everything needed to build Mozilla on Windows, sans Visual C++.
    
## Package Notes
This software does not create uninstall registry keys or an uninstaller.
Therefore, there is a manual uninstall script, however, it only works for the default install location.

Installs going to anything but the default location would need to be uninstalled outside of choco.
author: Mozilla
